org.imaginea.test.automation.framework.util.readers

Class ExcelReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.imaginea.test.automation.framework.util.readers.ExcelReader

  • public class ExcelReader
extends Object
    Utility to read Excel files. This file makes use of apache poi for reading excel files. It supports both "xls" and "xlsx" file extension.
    Author:
    Varun Menon

      • getOpenWorkbook

        public org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook getOpenWorkbook()

      • getData

        public String getData(int row,
             int column)
        Gets the data from the currently opened sheet based on row and column number
        Parameters:
        row - Row no. from which the value has to be fetched
        column - Respective column no. in the row from which the value has to be fetched
        Returns:
        The data present in the respective row & column. If no value is found it returns and empty String.

      • getNoOfRows

        public int getNoOfRows()
        Gets the no. of rows in the currently opened sheet
        Returns:
        The actual no of physical rows present

      • getNoOfColumn

        public int getNoOfColumn()
        Gets the no. of column present in the first row of the currently opened sheet.
        Returns:
        Return the no. of column present in the first row of the currently opened sheet.

      • getNoOfColumn

        public int getNoOfColumn(int rowNo)
        Gets the no. of column present in the specified row of the currently opened sheet.
        Parameters:
        rowNo - Row no. for which the no. of column have to evaluated.
        Returns:
        Return the no. of column present in the specified row of the currently opened sheet.

      • storeData

        public void storeData()
        Stores the whole data of the currently opened sheet in a Map containing keys

        public Map<String,List<String>> getStoredData()
